actions.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Mathias. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 513.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing the revision and printing of the Senate Manual for use during the Ninety-eighth Congress.

summary.text: Directs the Committee on Rules and Administration to prepare a revised edition, to be printed as a Senate document, of the Senate Rules and Manual for the use of the 98th Congress. Authorizes additional printing of such document for the use of the Senate and the Committee.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing the revision and printing of the Senate Manual for use during the Ninety-eighth Congress.
